title: A Wasting Time
description: With time running out, one man must decide whether to live or to die. Robot technician Angus Mundy has been living a lie for longer than he can remember. Struggling under the weight of a crippling drug addiction, he reaches a tipping point and begins to disintegrate when he loses a bet he cannot repay. The only way out is a deal that means certain death.Hilary Mundy, an idealistic young woman on the verge of adulthood, races to save the father she no longer knows, unaware that she may already be too late.
author: William Esmont
